content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® b210 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com merino del sol ladies vest to fit size 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 approx finished measurements 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 approx finished length 22 22 23½ 24½ 25½ 26 26 materials merino del sol 4 4 4 5 5 5 6 - 100g skeins shown in color 208 indigo heather gauge 18 sts = 4 on a us 7 needle over pattern stitch when slightly stretched needles us 6 and us 7 and a 24 circular size us 6 or size necessary to obtain given gauge 5 buttons from dill #300436 pattern stitch row 1 p2 * k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row row 2 k2 * p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row row 3 p2 * k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row row 4 knit 1x1 ribbing row 1 p1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end of row row 2 k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end of row repeat row 1 and 2 for ribbing back with smaller needles cast on 77 85 91 97 105 113 123 sts work 1x1 rib for 2 5 increasing 5 5 7 9 13 13 11 sts evenly across the last row of ribbing 82 90 98 106 118 126 134 sts change to larger needles and work in pattern stitch until piece measures 13 14 14½ 15 16 16 16 ending with a ws row armhole shaping bind off 6 7 8 8 8 8 9 sts at beg of next 2 row bind off 0 0 2 2 3 4 5 sts at beg of next 2 row decrease 1 st at each side on next and every following alternate row- 6 6 6 8 10 11 11 times total 58 64 66 70 76 80 84 sts continue even in pattern stitch until piece measures 21 21 22½ 23½ 24½ 25 25 from the beginning abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side rev st st = reverse stockinette stitch= knit the ws row purl the rs row pm = place marker p l y m o u t h y a r n® b210 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com shape shoulders bind off 5 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row bind off 5 6 5 6 7 7 8 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row bind off 5 6 6 6 7 8 8 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row bind off the remaining 28 30 34 34 36 36 38 sts for the back of the neck left front with smaller needles cast on 39 43 47 49 53 57 61 sts work
